# Wove
> Open-source toolkit for knitting and crochet with automated helpers
Documentation and CAD modules for a future robotic knitting machine.

## Docs
- [README](README.md): Getting started and setup
- [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md): Development workflow
- [CAD Overview](cad/README.md): Hardware modules
- [User Guides](docs/): Knitting basics and project documentation

## Examples
- [cad/](cad/): OpenSCAD modules and STL files
- [tests/](tests/): Example pytest suite

## Optional
- [CODE_OF_CONDUCT](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
- [Agents guide](AGENTS.md)
- [llmstxt directories](https://llmstxt.site/)
